QuestData.Title: Opaline Conch
QuestData.Description:
<The conch slumps following your assault -- the battle appears to be over.
It doesn't move. You bend over and pick it up, instinctively turning it over, wary of any attack.
It appears to be dead, but intact. You consider bringing the entire conch back to your allies in Mezzamere.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Opaline Conch to Artisan Itanu in Mezzamere in Nazjatar.
